derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French cinnamome (from Greek kinnamōmon), and Latin cinnamon (from Greek kinnamon), both from a Semitic language and perhaps based on Malay

encyclopedia.content: 桌面开放环境 Cinnamon 由Clement Lefebvre,Linux Mint创始的一个桌面交互环境，试图提供一个布局类似于GNOME 2，一个底部面板和发射器，GNOME2-like系统托盘和通知和更多。 2012年01月25日，由 Linux Mint 团队 Fork 自 GNOME Shell 的桌面交互环境 Cinnamon 发布首个稳定版本 1.2。 Cinnamon 提供丰富的桌面特效自定义： 内含诸如经典的果冻窗口等效果。 提供独立的特效控制中心，支持精细的自定义。 Cinnamon 提供三种风格的桌

entry.def: Cinnamon is a sweet spice used for flavouring food.

means.word_mean: 1. aromatic bark used as a spice
2. tropical Asian tree with aromatic yellowish-brown bark; source of the spice cinnamon
3. spice from the dried aromatic bark of the Ceylon cinnamon tree; used as rolled strips or ground
